feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 29, 08:00 - 17:00 UTC

Jan 16, 21:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer.

Start time : 29/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 29/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : If no action on customer side after 7 days of adding the spare, concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode and vMotion will be performed to evacuate virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for some hosts in ERI1C.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:
Jan 27, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 22, 00:29 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 27/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 31/01/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their host(s).

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2C][VMware Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 26, 04:50 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on VMware Private Cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 26/01/2025 04:03 UTC
End time : 26/01/2025 04:05 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 26, 04:37 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific rack.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 26/01/2025 04:03 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts in RBX2C are temporarily unreachable.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling module issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Vsphere management incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 15, 16:01 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that this incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:34 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 15:21 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 15, 15:16 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our hosted private cloud on managed vSphere offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:34 UTC
Impacted Services : The vSphere management access is currently unreachable on hosted private cloud with IAM enabled
Customers Impact : Customers with IAM enabled may encounter management access issues on vSphere management.
No impact on customers workload.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working diligently to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 15, 14:33 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident impacting our hosted private cloud on managed vSphere offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible.
As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
